item.title: Some Thoughts
item.description: Some thoughts on dev.to After a few weeks of reading dev.to, what I’ve learned is that there’s so many people there that are completely up themselves (which sometimes includes me). This sucks. Dev.to is a great idea, and the people who run it are completely lovely, however there’s people on there who are just so willing to peacock themselves that they forget what the point of the website is, which is to foster discussion.
